title: Bloomberg Markets: Gilead to Buy Kite for $11.9 Billion
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Gilead to Buy Kite for $11.9 Billion
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Asthika Goonewardene Senior Analyst:Biotech Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing Gilead Sciences Inc. agreed to buy Kite Pharma Inc. for about $11.9 billion, making one of its biggest deals ever to expand beyond its eroding hepatitis C drug franchise. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
